title: fasthtml_opui
text:
This Libary is designed as an educational project to make using the Open Props UI Library easy to set up with a fast HTML Web App.
The first part of this app will build ‚Äúvendor‚Äù the required css structure for setting up the appplication to use; - Open Props CSS Custom Variables - Open Props UI
Future : FT implementation of - Simple Theme Changer Commponent - Simple Color Changer Component - Tabs - Button Group - Icons - Scroll - Text Size Changer - Full Screen / Centered

title: fasthtml_opui
text:
Usage

Installation
Install latest from from pypi
$ pip install fasthtml_opui


Documentation
Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub repository‚Äôs pages. Additionally you can find package manager specific guidelines on conda and pypi respectively.

text:
This is the componenet helper functions ‚Ä¶ WIP


source



 OpenPropsLink ()

Generates a  tag for the Open Props CSS stylesheet. Usage: Include this in the Head() of your FastHTML page.

source




 Button (*c, size=None, variant='outlined', cls=None, **kwargs)


Button("Click me", size="small", variant="filled")

<button class="button small filled">Click me</button>



source




 IconButton (*c, size='small', **kwargs)

*Generates an  for icons with Open Props UI styling.
Args: *c: Children (e.g., icon elements). size: Size (‚Äòsmall‚Äô by default). **kwargs: Additional HTML attributes.
Returns: FastHTML Button component with appropriate classes.*

IconButton("üîç", size="small")
